title: kAruNya guruparanE kaN (sj)
sahitya:
kAruNya guruparanE kaN pArum karuNAkaraNAm endan kaliyurAdirukka endan kasN pArum


1:  pArum mA tuyar taru bhuvi idu tanilE paNindunai japaittiDa endan
 caraNam 2    AbhirAm dEvadEvA unai anudinamum AvalODu pADip-pOTra AbhirAmmukkaruL miga purindiDa
 caraNam 3    tAi uruvAi dayAparanum Agiya 
 caraNam 4    Aruiyir tandAi anaiyena nondE aruLukkoNDE aDiyEnukkenrE
adamevai pAvamaTra avani tanil kaNDOrgaL koNDADavenrE uyirttamatittuk-
 caraNam 5    tirurcittattE enai vaikkattAn ninai muzhu manadoDu pADa dinam bhuvi mayal viTTiDa manam taruvAi 
nI dayAparanE varuvAi aDiyEniDamE nilaiyAi irundiDa karuNAkaranAi kani mari sutan ena varu
